1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Subtree.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Subtree.Subtree
6  ( -- * Pattern
7    Subtree,
8    SubtreeOutput,
9    SubtreePattern (..),
10    subtreeL,
11    SubtreeTerm (..),
12    subtreeText, subtreeTexts,
13    subtree, subtreeOne,
14
15    -- * Filter
16    SubtreeFilter (..),
17    subtreeId, subtreeEq,
18    subtreeKeep, subtreeOmit,
19    subtreeChain,
20    subtreeFilter,
21  ) where
22
23import qualified System.FilePath.Glob                    as Glob
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                as O
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
26import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol           as S
27
28
29-- ============================================  Pattern
30
31-- | Subtree.
32type Subtree = B.RawTree [SubtreePattern] String String
33
34-- | Subtree output.
35type SubtreeOutput = B.RawTree [SubtreePattern] String (SubtreeTerm, String)
36
37-- | Subtree pattern.
38data SubtreePattern
39    = SubtreeL SubtreeTerm SubtreeFilter       -- ^ Leaf
40    | SubtreeB SubtreeFilter [SubtreePattern]  -- ^ Branch
41    | SubtreeR SubtreeFilter [SubtreePattern]  -- ^ Recursive branch
42      deriving (Show, Eq)
43
44-- | Create non-termination leaf pattern.
45subtreeL :: SubtreeFilter -> SubtreePattern
46subtreeL = SubtreeL SubtreeNone
47
48-- | Termination of subtree content.
49data SubtreeTerm
50    = SubtreeNone
51    | SubtreeText [String] S.TermName
52    | SubtreeSeq  S.TermName
53      deriving (Show, Eq)
54
55-- | Create text term.
56subtreeText :: (S.ToTermName n) => String -> n -> SubtreeTerm
57subtreeText c = subtreeTexts [c]
58
59-- | Create text term.
60subtreeTexts :: (S.ToTermName n) => [String] -> n -> SubtreeTerm
61subtreeTexts cs n = SubtreeText cs $ S.toTermName n
62
63-- | Select subtree.
64--
65--   >>> let tree = B.TreeB [] "Y1" [B.TreeL "Z1", B.TreeL "Z2", B.TreeB [] "Y2" [B.TreeL "Z3"]]
66--   >>> O.putLines $ B.ppRawTree tree
67--   > [] "Y1"
68--     - "Z1"
69--     - "Z2"
70--     > [] "Y2"
71--       - "Z3"
72--
73--   >>> O.putLines (B.ppRawTree O.<++> subtree [SubtreeB (subtreeEq "Y1") [subtreeL (subtreeEq "Z1")]] [tree])
74--   > [] "Y1"
75--     - (SubtreeNone,"Z1")
76--
77--   >>> O.putLines (B.ppRawTree O.<++> subtree [SubtreeR (subtreeId) [subtreeL (subtreeEq "Z3")]] [tree])
78--   > [] "Y1"
79--     > [] "Y2"
80--       - (SubtreeNone,"Z3")
81--
82--   >>> O.putLines (B.ppRawTree O.<++> subtree [SubtreeR (subtreeId) [subtreeL (subtreeEq "Z1")]] [tree])
83--   > [] "Y1"
84--     - (SubtreeNone,"Z1")
85--
86--   >>> O.putLines (B.ppRawTree O.<++> subtree [SubtreeB (subtreeId) [SubtreeL (subtreeText "A" "/z") (subtreeEq "Z1")]] [tree])
87--   > [] "Y1"
88--     - (SubtreeText ["A"] (TermName EQ "z"),"Z1")
89--
90subtree :: [SubtreePattern] -> [Subtree] -> [SubtreeOutput]
91subtree ps0 ts = p1 O.<?> ts where
92    p1 t = maybeHead (p2 t O.<?> ps0)
93
94    p2 t@(B.TreeL z) (SubtreeL term f)
95        | nullZ f t  = Nothing
96        | otherwise  = Just $ B.TreeL (term, z)
97    p2 t@(B.TreeB _ y xs) (SubtreeB f ps)
98        | nullY f t  = Nothing
99        | otherwise  = Just $ B.TreeB [] y (subtree ps xs)
100    p2 t@(B.TreeB _ y xs) (SubtreeR f ps)
101        | nullY f t  = Nothing
102        | otherwise  = case subtree (SubtreeR f ps : ps) xs of
103                         []  -> Nothing
104                         xs' -> Just $ B.TreeB [] y xs'
105    p2 _ _ = Nothing
106
107-- | Select subtree.
108subtreeOne :: [SubtreePattern] -> O.Map [Subtree]
109subtreeOne ps0 ts = p1 O.<?> ts where
110    p1 t = maybeHead (p2 t O.<?> ps0)
111
112    p2 t@(B.TreeL _) (SubtreeL _ f)
113        | nullZ f t  = Nothing
114        | otherwise  = Just t
115    p2 t@(B.TreeB _ y xs) (SubtreeB f ps)
116        | nullY f t  = Nothing
117        | otherwise  = Just $ B.TreeB ps y xs
118    p2 t@(B.TreeB _ y xs) (SubtreeR f ps)
119        | nullY f t  = Nothing
120        | otherwise  = Just $ B.TreeB (SubtreeR f ps : ps) y xs
121    p2 _ _ = Nothing
122
123nullZ :: SubtreeFilter -> Subtree -> Bool
124nullZ f t = null $ subtreeFilterOn getTreeZ f [t]
125
126nullY :: SubtreeFilter -> Subtree -> Bool
127nullY f t = null $ subtreeFilterOn getTreeY f [t]
128
129maybeHead :: [a] -> Maybe a
130maybeHead []       = Nothing
131maybeHead (a : _)  = Just a
132
133-- | Branch element of tree.
134getTreeY :: B.RawTree b y z -> Maybe y
135getTreeY (B.TreeB _ y _)  = Just y
136getTreeY _                = Nothing
137
138-- | Leaf element of tree.
139getTreeZ :: B.RawTree b y z -> Maybe z
140getTreeZ (B.TreeL z)  = Just z
141getTreeZ _            = Nothing
142
143
144-- ============================================  Filter
145
146-- | Subtree filter.
147data SubtreeFilter
148    = SubtreeId                                 -- ^ Identity
149    | SubtreeEq    String                       -- ^ Equality
150    | SubtreeKeep  String Glob.Pattern          -- ^ Glob
151    | SubtreeOmit  String Glob.Pattern          -- ^ Anti-glob
152    | SubtreeChain SubtreeFilter SubtreeFilter  -- ^ Filter chain
153      deriving (Show, Eq)
154
155instance Monoid SubtreeFilter where
156    mempty  = SubtreeId
157    mappend = subtreeChain
158
159-- | Identity filter.
160subtreeId :: SubtreeFilter
161subtreeId = SubtreeId
162
163-- | Equal filter.
164subtreeEq :: String -> SubtreeFilter
165subtreeEq = SubtreeEq
166
167-- | Glob filter.
168subtreeKeep :: String -> SubtreeFilter
169subtreeKeep s = SubtreeKeep s $ Glob.compile s
170
171-- | Anti-glob filter.
172subtreeOmit :: String -> SubtreeFilter
173subtreeOmit s = SubtreeOmit s $ Glob.compile s
174
175-- | Filter chain.
176subtreeChain :: O.Bin SubtreeFilter
177subtreeChain SubtreeId f = f
178subtreeChain f SubtreeId = f
179subtreeChain f g = SubtreeChain f g
180
181-- | Filter strings by subtree filter.
182--
183--   >>> subtreeFilter subtreeId ["foo", "bar", "foobar"]
184--   ["foo","bar","foobar"]
185--
186--   >>> subtreeFilter (SubtreeEq "bar") ["foo", "bar", "foobar"]
187--   ["bar"]
188--
189--   >>> subtreeFilter (subtreeKeep "foo*") ["foo", "bar", "foobar"]
190--   ["foo","foobar"]
191--
192--   >>> subtreeFilter (subtreeKeep "*bar") ["foo", "bar", "foobar"]
193--   ["bar","foobar"]
194--
195--   >>> subtreeFilter (subtreeOmit "foo*") ["foo", "bar", "foobar"]
196--   ["bar"]
197--
198--   >>> subtreeFilter (subtreeOmit "foo*") ["foo", "bar", "foobar"]
199--   ["bar"]
200--
201--   >>> subtreeFilter (subtreeKeep "foo*" O.++ subtreeOmit "*bar") ["foo", "bar", "foobar"]
202--   ["foo"]
203--
204subtreeFilter :: SubtreeFilter -> O.Map [String]
205subtreeFilter = subtreeFilterOn Just
206
207subtreeFilterOn :: (a -> Maybe String) -> SubtreeFilter -> O.Map [a]
208subtreeFilterOn get f xs0 = a xs0 [f] where
209    a xs []                        = xs
210    a xs (SubtreeId : fs)          = a xs fs
211    a xs (SubtreeEq x : fs)        = a xs' fs where xs' = O.keepOn get (== x) xs
212    a xs (SubtreeKeep _ p : fs)    = a xs' fs where xs' = O.keepOn get (Glob.match p) xs
213    a xs (SubtreeOmit _ p : fs)    = a xs' fs where xs' = O.omitOn get (Glob.match p) xs
214    a xs (SubtreeChain f1 f2 : fs) = a xs fs' where fs' = f1 : f2 : fs
215
